mdRecord.dcterms:description: Desire to make a difference and observation about truth. Quotation about the end of a love affair and reactions. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

Because we want to make a mark on this world | â†’an inerasable mark | Proof of truth - TRUTH DOES EXIST. | People say, "there are other fish in the sea" | I say "Fuck you | she was my sea." - J. Faulkner | corny-ass | damn Who hurt you | You must be a tiny, tiny man.
